sourcesContent:
import React from 'react' import PlayCircleFilledIcon from "@material-ui/icons/PlayCircleFilled"; import FavoriteIcon from "@material-ui/icons/Favorite"; import MoreHorizIcon from "@material-ui/icons/MoreHoriz"; import { useStateProviderValue } from '../../Context/StateProvider' import Header from '../Header' import './style.css' function Body({spotify}) { const [{ discover_weekly}, dispatch] = useStateProviderValue(); return (
PLAYLIST

{discover_weekly?.name}

{discover_weekly?.description}

{discover_weekly?.tracks.items.map(item=>item.track)}
) } export default Body
